sub_title: Accounting Assistant at Shin-Etsu Silicones Europe B.V.
summary:
Strong problem solving skills.
Accurate and proactive.
Hands-on, enthusiastic, ambitions and eager to learn.
Positive attitude and high ethics.
Flexible and energetic.
Ability to work different tasks at the same time.
Ability to work within a time-constrained environment.
Ability to adapt to changing priorities and handling both routine and complex accounting duties.

profile_positions.description:
1. Booking AP within Accounting System (Micorsoft Dynamics AX / D365).

2. Monitoring and managing of accounts payable.

3. Scheduling a payment plan and settlement of payments.

4. Arranging authorization of payment of invoices and execute payment.

5. Preparation of document for VAT filing (DE/FR) and Intrastat report (DE).

6. Report on merchandise inventory movement and analyse the movement.

7. Managing of BS (temporary) account and journal entries.

8. Support on preparation of monthly, quarterly, yearly closing (GL).

9. Controlling opening/closing cash accounts. (especially foreign currency)

10. Cash management (including analysis of the current cash situation and prediction of future cash situation). (especially foreign currency)

11. Report on the confirmation balance with group companies.
profile_positions.title: Accounting Assistant

profile_positions.description:
1. Booking AP within Microsoft Dynamics AX and creating payment proposal.

2. Issuing sales invoices and creating receipt journals.

3. Controlling opening/closing cash accounts.

4. Managing Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable.

5. Managing the balance of AP and AR booked in foreign currency to minimize exposure to FX fluctuations.

6. Journalizing of all cash movement (bank statement), economic activities (accrual etc), depreciation and amortization, and checking all journal entries and General Ledger.

7. Preparing monthly, quarterly, half-year and year-end closing (valuation of Trial Balance, BS, PL)

8. Preparing documents for external and internal auditing.

9. Cash management (including analysis of the current cash situation and prediction of future cash situation).

10. Advising top management regarding loans and deposits to ensure a healthy cash situation.

11. Making new loans (also including repayment and prepayment), deposit, and foreign exchange.

12. Monthly analyses of results versus budget and versus previous month.

13. Preparing documents for tax issues.
profile_positions.title: Management Assistant Finance & Accounting

profile_positions.description:
Planning (April 2007- December 2009)
1. Planning the reorganization of the university and establishing new    departments in the light of increasing inter-university competition.

2. Researching trends in the competition and in the university’s target groups.

3. Negotiating with the Japanese Ministry of Education and other governmental institutions regarding education and legislation.

4. Issuing press releases to the media.

5. Planning and execution of university events. 

Accounting (July 2007 - December 2009)
1.  Controlling expenses and journal entry. 

2.  Applying for subsidies to the Japanese Ministry of Education and other governmental institutions.
profile_positions.title: Planning & Accounting

profile_positions.description:
Sales manager (July 2005 - March 2007)
1. Managing the sales process and supervising salesmen.

2. Maintaining good relations with end users and business partners.

3. Providing customized advice regarding lease products and explaining the benefits of lease from the viewpoint of accounting, finance and taxation. 

4. Analyzing the financial situation of clients using their financial statements for risk management purpose (credit rating).

Salesman (April 2001 - June 2005)
1. Generating new business.

2. Maintaining good relations with existing clients.

3. Providing customized advice regarding lease products and explaining the benefits of lease from the viewpoint of accounting, finance and taxation.

4. Execution of the entire sales process from quotation to contract.

5. Analyzing the financial situation of clients using their financial statements for risk management purpose (credit rating).
profile_positions.title: Sales manager in the Lease department
